name: RachtPege
description: RachtPege This game is about my final project for the Unity 3D video game development course at EOI, and it's my first game.  It's an RPG where you kill enemies, level up, unlock weapons that you can also level up and upgrade, and use them to break barriers that separate different zones of the map, until you reach and kill the final boss to beat the game. The initial concept was to make a game where you kill enemies and level up. It was difficult to accurately calculate the scope of the project as it was my first game and I was just starting with programming, so the idea evolved as I progressed at a certain pace. Overall, the result has been more ambitious than what I initially planned. It was made in 2 months.  RachtPege GitHub RachtPege Web Screenshots
